channel.title: CVE Feed for Airspan Networks -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Airspan Networks -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-21800|2024-09-16T17:02:53.261Z -- airspan%20networks -- mmp
item.description: MMP: All versions prior to v1.0.3, PTP C-series: Device versions prior to v2.8.6.1, and PTMP C-series and A5x: Device versions prior to v2.5.4.1 uses the MD5 algorithm to hash the passwords before storing them but does not salt the hash. As a result, attackers may be able to crack the hashed passwords.

item.title: CVE-2022-21176|2024-09-16T16:47:59.255Z -- airspan%20networks -- mmp
item.description: MMP: All versions prior to v1.0.3, PTP C-series: Device versions prior to v2.8.6.1, and PTMP C-series and A5x: Device versions prior to v2.5.4.1 does not properly sanitize user input, which may allow an attacker to perform a SQL injection and obtain sensitive information.
